Package index

All functions

assess()
Assess a model
aucs()
Return multi-class AUC (Area Under the Curve) for ranger models from caret
check_files()
Check that each source file exists on the result directory and is up to date
derive()
Create derived variables such as NDVI and NDRE
do_derive()
Create derived variables such as NDVI and NDRE
do_fit()
Fit models
do_gather()
Collect raster data for each site
do_map()
Build a map of geoTIFF of predictions for specified model fit
find_orthos()
Find orthophotos for a site
fit()
Fit models
fix_names()
Fix errors and inconsistencies in orthophoto file names
flights_report()
Produce a flights report for one or more sites
gather()
Collect raster data for each site
get_dir()
Return directory listing as a data frame from the local drive, Google Drive, or SFTP site
init()
Initialize salt-marsh-mapping with user parameters
load_database()
Load the specified database unless we've already got it
map()
Build a geoTIFF map of predictions for specified model fit
map_finish()
Finish do_map run, updating maps database
new_db()
Create a new database
pickvars()
pick variables based on importance >= n
plot_predict()
Read a predict grid and plot it nicely
read_pars_table()
Read a parameter table
resolve_dir()
Resolve directory with embedded <site> or <share>
sample()
Sample Y and X variables for a site
save_database()
Save the specified database
screen()
Screen imagery for salt marsh project
search_names()
Find orthoimages that match search names
set_dirs()
Set complete paths to all directories
set_up_google_drive()
Creates a token to set up the Google Drive
the
Script to set up environment for parameters
unconfuse()
Clean up confusion matrix and associated stats
